statements: DELETE FROM clickstream_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_id = 456;
DELETE FROM clickstream_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'click';
DELETE FROM clickstream_data WHERE timestamp < '2021-10-01' AND page_id = 456;
DELETE FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND event_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM ClickstreamData WHERE action = 'click' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM clicks WHERE click_id = 5 AND page_id IN (SELECT page_id FROM pages WHERE category = 'News');
DELETE FROM engagements WHERE user_id = 10 OR (page_id = 20 AND duration_seconds > 60);
